snippet: A federal appeals court on Friday upheld a regulatory safety finding against SeaWorld in the drowning of a trainer who was pulled under by a killer whale.
lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court on Friday upheld a regulatory safety finding against SeaWorld in the drowning of a trainer who was pulled under by a killer whale.

headline.main: Florida: Court Upholds Ruling Against Seaworld
headline.print_headline: Florida: Court Upholds Ruling Against Seaworld
